Not what it used to be

Llevo más de 1300 hs, y claramente es el mejor shooter, las cuentas duran para toda la vida, por lo que no es un juego casual, el único problema es la cantidad de personas utilizando trampas, y la cantidad de cuentas 'smurf' contra las que empareja, termina afectando el rango y la experiencia de juego en general, a ésta altura todavía no encontraron solución a ese problema y es bastante molesto tener que lidiar con eso a diario, sobre todo para la gente que recién empieza.
Recomiendo jugar solo premade, y obtener status prime cuanto antes porque es un asco la cantidad de chiteros y smurf que se van a cruzar.
If they are better than you just say "bro they are cheating" but then you realize you got put against 2 global elites in a wingman game when you are gold nova 2
a lot of russian players but good game

Ohh boy, the good old loved and hated CSGO. Everyone in this community loves it or hates it. For me, looking back at the memories, are very .... empty. I mean, like i can't remember how the game felt in 2017  etc. But the worst thing is that i started playing in like ... around 2016-2017 and i have only 300 hours. If you ask me how is this possible then let me tell you that i had like a 1-2 year stop for the game. But that's not the thing. Most of the times people say that the game is full of hackers, the hitbox is horribble etc. Personally, I never really met any cheaters and i didn't have hitbox problems ( most of the time). But with the free to play update, the hacker problem got way bigger then it was before. i have played with prime-non prime players aaand... There are too many of them, hackers i mean. But the game is still very enjoyable even nowadays. Great new skins, the player model idea was not the best idea, but i thank it. It's good to see that Valve is still caring about this community. The only negativity is that when you stop playing for like a week-month-year and you have to practice yourself up 'til the point you become good again. Also the TEAMMATES now those players ... they are not the best. Back in the old days Russians were the worst players in cs but not nowadays. It's the stupid kids that are speaking their Pakistan languege (no offense, i love Pakistan) flaming about they fucking your mum etc. While the Russians (as a stereotype in csgo) they only speak Russian, swear a lot and fun the game. While those other players Flame even worse than anyone, don't info, can't even play the game even while focused. But all this, you play the game (a lot) but you can't really know what keeps you playing. Maybe the graphics, the game modes, the weapons or learning new skills in the game. For me, it's my fun with my friends while playing the game or with the community. Overall the game is still fantastic it's even one of the most iconic, legendary FPS still. I always loved it and will love it.
